subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Rathore ruler of Marwar?
question_hi: मरवे के पहले रात्री राजों कौन थे।
explanation_en: Rao Jodha was the first Rathore ruler of Marwar. He is famous for constructing Jodhpur, also known as Mehrangarh Fort.
explanation_hi: राव जोधा मरवे के पहले राजों के बेयां समान करें।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the last Rathore ruler of Udaipur?
question_hi: उदतां केयां के बेयां किसे बेय
